5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: A man asked Ibn ‘Umar:“How should I perform Witr?” He said: “Pray Witr with one Rak’ah.” He said: “I am afraid that the people will say that I am cutting the prayer short.” He said: “The Sunnah of Allah and His Messenger.” Meaning “This is the Sunnah of Allah and His Messenger.”

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْوِتْرِ بِرَكْعَةٍ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning Praying one Rak’ah for Witr
